ID.Name: ID
ID.Description: FHIR identifier for the target Condition resource.

Condition.Name: Condition
Condition.Description: An instance of the R4 Condition resource.

bodySite.Name: bodySite
bodySite.Description: Locations of the finding including tooth, surfaces, and sites for furcation and suppuration findings.

clinicalStatus.Name: clinicalStatus
clinicalStatus.Description: The clinical status of a finding. Active or resolved.

encounter.Name: encounter
encounter.Description: The encounter this finding was documented in.

text.Name: text
text.Description: The comment associated with this finding.

recordedDate.Name: recordedDate
recordedDate.Description: The date the finding was first documented.

recorder.Name: recorder
recorder.Description: The provider who documented the finding.

subject.Name: subject
subject.Description: The patient or subject of this finding.
